name: ButtonCraft
description:
This mod is specifically designed NOT to be fun. It is also implemented poorly and dangerously on a code level, so I wouldn't be suprised if it has a lot of incompatabilities, however I know it works with Lithium, Phosphor, and Sodium.

XP orbs are removed from the game. The only way to gain xp is to press buttons.
Wood: 20 ticks, Expected -0.3 XP
Stone: 40 ticks, Expected 0 XP
Diamond: 80 ticks, Expected 5 XP
Netherite: 160 ticks, expected 25 XP
